public static final int NUMBER_ROTATIONS
Number of rotation modes for BoardUtil.rotate().

rotate(int, net.sf.gogui.go.GoPoint, int), Constant Field Values
Method Detail

copy

public static void copy(Board target,
                        ConstBoard source)
Copy the state of one board to another. Initializes the target board with the size and the setup stones of the source board and executes all moves of the source board on the target board.

toString

public static java.lang.String toString(ConstBoard board)
Get board position as text diagram (without additional game information). Calls toString() with withGameInfo == false.

See Also:
#toString(ConstBoard, boolean)

toString

public static java.lang.String toString(ConstBoard board,
                                        boolean withGameInfo,
                                        boolean color)
Get board position as text diagram.

Parameters:
board - The board to print.
withGameInfo - Print additional game information on the right side of the board (at present only number of prisoners)
color - Colorize board using ANSI escape sequences
Returns:
Board position as text diagram.

rotate

public static GoPoint rotate(int rotationMode,
                             GoPoint point,
                             int size)
Rotate/mirror point. Rotates and/or mirrors a point on a given board according to a given rotation mode.
Modexy
0xy
1size - x - 1y
2xsize - y - 1
3yx
4size - y - 1x
5ysize - x - 1
6size - x - 1size - y - 1
7size - y - 1size - x - 1

Parameters:
rotationMode - The rotation mode in [0..NUMBER_ROTATIONS]
point - The point to be rotated
size - The board size
Returns:
The rotated mirrored point
